BLACK FRIDAY VPS DEAL 2021!

HosterPlan is offering a lifetime recurring discount of 5 USD to 11 USD on multi location SSD Cloud VPS. This offer is valid for the first purchase as well as for renewal.
You can deploy the server from our 8 data center locations to the location of your choice.

Our data center is located in - New York, Sun Fransisco, Toronto, London, Amsterdam, Frankfurt, Bangalore and Singapore.

The information of all the packages is given below -

IPv6 : Yes
